preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 6 g of gallium using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 2 g of nickel using the same balance. 
 3. Measure 20 g of scandium carefully. 
 4. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry ceramic or glass container.
